introView.heading: Psihološko savjetovanje za svakodnevne probleme
introView.preamble: Ovdje smo za vas ako trebate s kim razgovarat. Zdravlje.nu vam nudi psihološke savjetovanje diskretno i po razumnoj cijeni. U razgovoru prepoznajemo koje misli i emocije vas sprečavaju da se osjećate dobro i budete uspješni u životu, te radimo na promjeni.
introView.cookieText: Mi koristimo kolačiće za ažuriranje trenutnog porudžbina. Podaci se čuvaju samo privremeno i uklanjaju zajedno sa kompletnom kupovinom.

issueView.heading: Uzmite prvi korak za bolje sutra
issueView.preamble: Da biste pronašli rješenja za svoju situaciju, može vam biti korisno potražiti stručnu podršku i pomoć. Kontaktirajte nas, mi možemo pomoći.

stress.name: Stres
stress.description: Jeste li pod stresom i imate li poteškoće u rješavanju istih?

anxiety.name: Sikiracija
anxiety.description: Osjećate li da se sikirate i da ne možete podnijeti brigu?

exhaustion.name: Iscrpljenost
exhaustion.description: Imate li poteškoća sa spavanjem, umorom i iscrpljenjošću?

backPain.name: Bol
backPain.description: Trebate li pomoć o olakšavanju bola?

depression.name: Depresivno
depression.description: Osjećate li se tužno ili depresivno?

kids.name: Diete
kids.description: Da li vaše dijete ima izlive bijesa?

weight.name: Tezina
weight.description: Imate li problema sa tjelesnom težinom?

panic.name: Panic
panic.description: Osjećate li anksioznost ili napad panike?

fobia.name: Fobia
fobia.description: Imate li fobije koje vas sprečavaju u životu?

violence.name: Sukob
violence.description: Ulazite li lako u sukobe i jeste li frustrirani?

stuck.name: Zaglavili
stuck.description: Jeste li zaglavili osobno ili profesionalno?

quoteView.quote2: šta kažeš i šta radiš je u harmoniji."

quoteImageView.quote1: "Tajna promjene je da fokusirate svu svoju energiju,
quoteImageView.quote2: ne na borbu sa starim, već na izgradnji novog."

staffView.heading: Ko smo mi
staffView.preamble: Nasi psiholozi su svi uključenje u društvo psihologa Federacije BiH,

howItWorksView.heading: Kako radi
howItWorksView.intro: Ako ste spremni da istražite način na koji razmišljate i osjećate, ovdje smo opisali korake kako ćete omogućiti da dobijete psihološko savjetovanje sa zdravlje.nu.

step1.heading: 1. Procjena
step1.text: Razgovarajte bez troška deset do petnest minuta sa našim psiholozima preko telefona (+387 603 21 22 90 ili +387 66 23 60 83) ili proko Skypea (Skype adresa xxxx) kako biste utvrdili vaše savjetodavne potrebe.

step2.heading: 2. Izaberite plan za vas
step2.text: Izaberite plan plaćanja koji odgovara vašim potrebama i budžetu. Izaberite između Skype-razgovore, e-poštu ili kombinaciju oba. Možete platiti karticom, paypal-om ili fakturom.

step3.heading: 3. Termin
step3.text2: Alternativno možete unaprijed platiti za psihološko savjetovanje. Nakon što smo primili vašu uplatu, mi ćemo vas kontaktirat za inicijalnu besplatnu procjenu i za zakazivanje termina

step4.heading: 4. Psiholosko savjetoanje
step4.text1: Standardna Skype konsultacija na Zdravlje.nu je 20 ili 45 minuta. Treba vam tiha, privatna osvijetljena soba, pouzdana internet konekcija i pametni telefon ili računar sa mikrofonom i web kamerom. Savjetovanje se takođe može uraditi putem e-pošte, samostalno ili u kombinaciji sa Skype pozivima.
step4.text2: U razgovoru dobićete pomoć da saznate svoje misli, osećanja i akcije. Zajedno istražujete šta je problem, kako se to desilo i šta možete učiniti da biste to promjenili.

paymentView.heading: Koliko kosta psihološko savjetovanje?
paymentView.intro: Ovdje možete naručiti psihološko savjetovanje. Cijenu za vase izbore mozete naci u doljnem dio stranice. Izaberite Skype-poziv, e-postu ili kombinaciju Skype-poziv i e-postu. Što više poziva ili sedmica e-poste odlučite da kupite, sto jeftinija je cena po pozivu i po sedmicu e-poste.
paymentView.selectPackageText: Izaberite jedan Skype-poziv ili paket sa više Skype-poziva. Možete kombinovati sa e-poštom.
paymentView.emailSmallText: Neograničen broj e-pošte, odgovor u toku 24h. Možete kombinovati sa Skype-pozivom.
paymentView.emailLargeText: Neograničen broj e-pošte, odgovor u toku 4h radnim danima 07.00-22.00, vikend i praznik 09.00-18.00.

preamble.text1: Baunad doo Tuzla is the author and publisher of the internet resource zdravlje.nu, a portal providing counselling services through web, mobile, audio and video. Baunad is a limited company with its registered office at Marsala Tita 109, 75000 Tuzla, Bosna and Herzegovina.
preamble.text2: The terms “Baunad”, “we” and “our” refer to Baunad doo Tuzla. The terms “you,” “your,” and “yourself” refer to the individual user of the services.
preamble.text3: If you have any questions about any part of the terms and conditions, or if you have ideas as to how we can improve our services, feel free to contact us at info@zdravlje.nu or +387 603 21 22 90; +387 66 23 60 83.
preamble.text4: These terms and conditions were last updated on December 15 th 2017.

services.heading: Services offered
services.text1: Our objective is to make access to counselling services easier and more cost effective. We want to ensure that you experience the best in ethical, legal and professional standards and that you have the service that is right for you.
services.text2: Our counselling services are conducted by psychologists who are registered by xxx in Bosnia and Hercegovina. You can be informed about the diplomas and certifications of our psychologists by browsing their profiles.
services.text3: You can avail of online counselling services from our panel of psychologists through texting, email, audio and/or video conferencing after online payment. Apart from electronic audio-video consultations, online sessions, texts and email, you may use resources such as blogs on topics of general interest and awareness about mental health, and read questions and answers in the “Q&A” section.
services.text4: Baunad cannot and does not assume any responsibility for any loss, damages or liabilities arising from your misuse of any advise, ideas, information, instructions or guidelines accessed through the service.
services.text5: Our services are primarily provided in Bosnian and English. We will always try to help you to see a psychologist who suits your particular needs, however, we can only provide a closest match and cannot promise that you will be able to see a psychologist who can speak your native language or who has direct experience of the culture or country in which you live or have grown up.
services.text6: If you believe that our services have not met the standard of reasonable skilled and qualified professionals, then please contact us to let us know. We will treat your concerns seriously. Should we agree that standards are not being met, we will be happy to fix, refund or re-perform the service we have provided.
services.text7: Psychologist cannot prescribe medicines, as it is not within their authority to do so.
services.text8: The services may change from time to time, at the sole discretion of Baunad, and the agreement will apply to your visit to and your use of the zdravlje.nu website to avail the services, as well as to all information provided by you on the website at any given point in time.

terms.heading: Client terms of use

preamble.text1: THE USE OF OUR ONLINE SERVICES IS NOT MEANT FOR EMERGENCIES.
preamble.text2: IF YOU ARE THINKING ABOUT SUICIDE OR IF YOU ARE CONSIDERING TAKING ACTIONS THAT MAY CAUSE HARM TO YOU OR TO OTHERS OR IF YOU FEEL THAT YOU OR ANY OTHER PERSON MAY BE IN ANY DANGER OR IF YOU HAVE ANY MEDICAL EMERGENCY, YOU MUST IMMEDIATELY CALL THE EMERGENCY SERVICE NUMBER AND NOTIFY THE RELEVANT AUTHORITIES.

terms.text1: In order to be eligible to use our services, you must not have a serious mental health issue, e.g. diagnosed with schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, or drug or alcohol dependence.
terms.text2: The terms and conditions are applicable to your using (including browsing) of the zdravlje.nu website and/or availing of any of our services through the website or otherwise. By accessing or using our services, you irrevocably accept all the terms and conditions stipulated in this document and agree to abide by them. If you do not agree to all of these terms and conditions, you are not authorized to use our services. So, please read the terms and conditions carefully.
terms.text3: You must be 18 years of age or older to register, use the services, or visit or use the website zdravlje.nu in any manner. By registering, visiting and using the website zdravlje.nu or accepting this agreement, you represent and warrant to Baunad that you are 18 years of age or older, and that you have the right, authority and capacity to use the website zdravlje.nu and the services available through the website, and agree to and abide by this agreement.
terms.text4: You hereby certify that you are over the age of eighteen (18). In the event that your certification is inaccurate, you agree to indemnify Baunad from any resulting damages, costs, or claims.
terms.text5: Baunad reserves the right to suspend access to the website and our services, and terminate association with any user/client who violates the terms and conditions of the zdravlje.nu website or disturbs the smooth functioning of the website and the dissemination of its services or disturbs other users or professionals in their activities, at its sole discretion.
terms.text6: We do not tolerate abuse or offensive behaviour towards our psychologists.
terms.text7: Baunad reserves the right to stop access to the zdravlje.nu website and services, and terminate association with any user/client who is suspected to be illegal and/or fraudulent and/or abusive and/or competitive and may be referred to appropriate law enforcement authorities. You shall be liable to indemnify Baunad for any losses incurred as a result of any action that has adversely affected Baunad or its users/clients.

changes.heading: Changes to terms and conditions
changes.text1: Baunad reserves the right to modify or totally change this “Terms and Conditions” anytime and as many times without giving any prior notice.
changes.text2: You have to review the “Terms and Conditions” from time to time to find out about the changes in it.
changes.text3: Visiting, using the resources, and/or availing the service/s from zdravlje.nu after any change in “Terms and Conditions” has been made, means you have acknowledged and agreed to the changes made in it.

payment.heading: Payment
payment.text1: The payment for any session is always payable prior to the appointment. If we do not receive payment before the time of the appointment, with funds cleared into our bank, the appointment will be cancelled or postponed.
payment.text2: If your appointment lasts longer than the allotted time, you will be liable for a charge of 2 BAM per minute for the extra time taken.
payment.text3: If your appointment lasts shorter than the allotted time, and the reason is on your side, then we are not responsible to refund charges or compensate you. If, however, the appointment lasts shorter with two (2) minutes or more and the reason is on our side, then you will be compensated with another, equal session.
payment.text4: Baunad offers three ways to pay for our services:
payment.text5: The invoice has information on how to make payment to a bank in Bosnia and Herzegovina. In case wrong bank account details are entered on a payment slip, we will not be responsible for loss of money, if any.
payment.text6: In case of there being any technical failure, at the time of transaction and there is a problem in making payment, you could contact info@zdravlje.nu.

failure.heading: Failure to attend a consultation
failure.text: Should you fail to attend a consultation without giving at least 24 hours notice, though we will listen sympathetically to any reasons that you may give for not attending, the full cost of the appointment will be chargeable. Any decision to refund any or all of the cost of the consultation will be at our discretion.

cancel.heading: Cancellations
cancel.text1: A full 24 hours notice is required for cancelling appointments without cost.
cancel.text2: Appointments cancelled with at least 24 hours notice can be rescheduled or refunded. Any refunds will be deducted an administrative cost of 20 KM and any nonrefundable payment costs.
cancel.text3: If you cancel with less than 24 hours before your appointment time, you will be billed for the full cost of your scheduled session.

disclaimer.heading: Disclaimers
disclaimer.text1: You should never rely on or make health or well-being decisions purely on the use of zdravlje.nu. Never disregard, avoid, or delay in obtaining medical advice from your doctor because of information or advice you received through zdravlje.nu.
disclaimer.text2: None of the service content represents or warrants that any particular treatment is safe, appropriate, or effective for you. You should always talk to an appropriately qualified health care professional for diagnosis and treatment, including information regarding which medications or treatment may be appropriate for you.
disclaimer.text3: We do not warrant that our services will meet your specific needs or requirements, nor do we warrant that the quality of our services will meet your expectations.

access.heading: Accessing our services
access.text1: Access to our services and the information contained therein is provided “as-is” and “as available” without any warranty of any kind, express or implied. Baunad does not warrant that access to the service will be uninterrupted or error-free, or that defects, if any, will be corrected. You expressly agree that your use of the service and your reliance upon any of its content is at your sole risk.
access.text2: Baunad has no responsibility for technical failures or faults arising out of causes over which we have no control and we are not responsible to refund charges or compensate you if they occur. You shall be solely and fully responsible for any damage to the service or any computer system, any loss of data, or any improper use or disclosure of information on the service caused by you or any person using your username or password. Baunad cannot and does not assume any responsibility for any loss, damages or liabilities arising from the failure of any telecommunications infrastructure, or the internet or for your misuse of any protected health information, advise, ideas, information, instructions or guidelines accessed through the service. If you are dissatisfied with the zdravlje.nu website, your sole remedy is to discontinue using the website.
access.text3: Technical or security threats or issues affecting the infrastructure may require us to suspend our services and postpone consultations in order to ensure they are secure and/or operating optimally. We will minimise these suspensions, but are not responsible to refund charges or compensate you if they occur, unless they exceed 30 days in length, in which event you may cancel your agreement to take a consultation with us and receive a full refund.
access.text4: Anti-virus and anti-malware software is in use on the website, but we cannot guarantee that the website will be free from viruses or malicious software so please ensure anti-virus and anti-malware software are in operation on any device with which you use to access our website.
access.text5: You are responsible for any data usage fees and other third party charges you incur in connection with your access to our services, including the fees that may be charged by your internet service provider and/or other service providers.
access.text6: Members of our psychologist team may not always be available to provide services to you and in the unlikely event that there is a possible delay of more than 30 days to service performance, you may cancel your agreement with us (and we may do the same) and receive a full refund.
access.text7: Our services are personalised and so you may only transfer your rights or obligations to another person if we agree to it.

parties.heading: Third parties
parties.text: The zdravlje.nu website may be linked to the website of third parties, affiliates and business partners. Baunad has no control over, and not liable or responsible for content, accuracy, validity, reliability, quality of such websites or made available by/through our website. Inclusion of any link on the zdravlje.nu website does not imply that Baunad endorses the linked site. You may use the links and these services at your own risk.

recordings.heading: Recordings
recordings.text1: We never record video sessions to protect your identity.
recordings.text2: If it would come to Baunad’s knowledge that you have recorded online session(s) and published on social media or any other media sharing platforms, then we reserve the right to suspend services, terminate your account and possibly take legal action against you.

limitation.heading: Limitation of liability
limitation.text1: Where we are permitted by Bosnian and Hercegovina’s law, we exclude all conditions, warranties, representations or other terms which may apply whether expressed or implied. Even though we accept clients from outside of Bosnia and Hercegovina, we can’t take responsibility for any laws outside Bosnia and Hercegovina regarding access to and use of our services.
limitation.text2: In no event, including but not limited to negligence, shall Baunad, or any of its directors and employees, or content or service providers, be liable for any direct, indirect, special, incidental or consequential matter relating to the Zdravlje.nu website or our services.
limitation.text3: The services supplied are for personal use and we are not responsible for any business-related losses arising out of the use of our services.
limitation.text4: If you have failed to adhere to our instructions or advice on use and your device suffers any damage from defective digital content, we are not responsible for compensation.
limitation.text5: Our total liability to you in respect of all losses arising under or in connection with these terms shall in no circumstances exceed the price you have paid to us for the services.

property.heading: Intellectual property rights
property.text1: We own copyright and other intellectual property rights on the zdravlje.nu website, for our services and their content.
property.text2: You are permitted to use our website and consultation system in order to receive our services. You are not permitted to copy, distribute or make any business use of zdravlje.nu.

complaints.heading: Complaints and Disputes
complaints.text1: What to do if you have a complaint with regards to our services:
complaints.text2: These terms and conditions are governed by Bosnian and Herzegovina’s law. This means that any dispute or claim arising out of it will be governed by Bosnian and Herzegovina’s law and the court in Tuzla will have exclusive jurisdiction over
complaints.list1: Give us feedback on our services by contacting us at info@zdravlje.nu.
complaints.list2: Please tell us about any complaints you might have as soon as possible, so we are able to resolve it as soon as possible.
complaints.list3: If you have a complaint, we may ask you for certain details about you and your complaint in order to address it. Please provide these as soon as possible so that we can handle your complaint quickly.
complaints.list4: We will investigate any complaint and keep you updated on the results of the investigation.
complaints.list5: We shall also discuss the investigation with you. If we are in the wrong, we shall apologise to you.
complaints.list6: If the subject of your complaint is to do with the professional standards or behaviour of one of our psychologists, we will treat your concern seriously. Should we agree that standards are not being met, we will be happy to fix, refund or re-perform the service we have provided.

faqView.heading: Frequently asked questions
faqView.preamble: You will be asked to complete an evaluation form once your sessions come to an end, this will enable us to better our service.

individualCouncelling.heading: What is individual councelling
individualCouncelling.text: Counselling is a form of talking therapy which allows the individual to express their problems, feelings and negative thoughts in a dependable and confidential environment. Counsellors aim to listen and to help you identify and taking the right steps to deal with any issues you may be facing. Counselling provides a safe and confidential space to enable clients to explore ways to deal with situations and crises you may be facing. It is a place to be listened to and obtain support, a place to work on your fears and anxieties and how these affect your life and relationships. Most importantly, it is place to help us realize that we do have choices and that by defining the life we want to live, we can create possibilities in our lives to live a more fulfilled life of our choice.

forMe.heading: How can I be sure counselling is for me?
forMe.text: You have the opportunity to receive an introduction to counselling free of charge for ten to fifteen minutes by telephone. Call us on +387 603 21 22 90 or +387 66 23 60 83 or via Skype (Skype name zdravlje.nu) and talk to one of our psychologists. S/he will discuss with you about your needs, current situation and your counselling goals and explain how online counselling is done at zdravlje.nu. There is a possibility to book an appointment during the call if you feel we could be of help for you. Kindly note this appointment will only be temporary and will be cancelled if we do not receive payment before the session.

discretion.heading: Will anybody know that I am talking with a counsellor?
discretion.text: You can talk to our counsellors from the comfort of your own home, your family and friends none the wiser you are doing so. Confidentiality will be maintained at all times and we shall always protect your personal information. Any and all information collected through our Internet sites and counselling sessions will be strictly confidential and will not be sold, rented, or otherwise disclosed to any third party not actively engaged in providing services to our customers. To protect you, our psychologists will not write notes into our computer system during counselling sessions, only in their note books. These notebooks have your identity coded and are locked when not used for preparations or in sessions with you. We also never record video sessions to protect your identity. To best serve you, your psychologist may discuss your case with other psychologists at zdravlje.nu without revealing your identity. This way you will benefit from the skills and experiences of more psychologists than the one you are talking to.

rebook.heading: Can I rebook or cancel a counselling session?
rebook.text: Of course it is possible, we have 24 hours free rebooking and cancellation policy.

book.heading: How do I book an appointment?
book.text1: You book an appointment by contacting us at:
book.text2: Alternately you can prepay for counselling on zdravlje.nu and we will contact you after we have received the payment. During the payment process you will have the option to choose time slots that would suit you best.

safe.heading: Is it safe to pay online?
safe.text: We use Stripe and PayPal for online payments. They both take security seriously and are used by many businesses worldwide. The credit or debit card data that you enter on zdravlje.nu is never sent to our servers, instead the data is sent directly to Stripe. This is important, because this way we will not handle any sensitive credit or debit card data on our servers. You can read more about how Stripe handles payment data on https://stripe.com/docs/security. If you choose to pay with PayPal, you will be redirected to a secure PayPal payment page. Again, no sensitive payment data will be handled on our servers. We are using SSL certificate on our website zdravlje.nu. SSL is a standard security technology that establishes a secure link (i.e. encrypted channel) between your web browser and our website zdravlje.nu. All communication transmitted through this link is encrypted, making the information private and secure. You will know the SSL is working if you find a small green lock icon in the address bar area.

eligible.heading: Who is eligible to use services at zdravlje.nu?
eligible.text: Our counselling services are for anybody wanting to live a more fulfilled life by working on their everyday issues. In order to be eligible to use our services, you must not have a serious mental health issue, e.g. diagnosed with schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, drug or alcohol dependence, or any other mental diagnosis. Kindly note the use of our online services is not meant for emergencies. If you are thinking about suicide or if you are considering taking actions that may cause harm to you or to others or if you feel that you or any other person may be in any danger or if you have any medical emergency, you must immediately call the emergency service number and notify relevant authorities. You must be 18 years of age or older to use our services, or visit or use the website zdravlje.nu in any manner.

getStarted.heading: What do I need to get started?
getStarted.text1: For Skype calls you will need a stable, reasonably high-speed internet access, a computer or smart phone with built in camera and audio capability, a quiet, private room, and a working Skype application.
getStarted.text2: To get the application Skype installed, visit
getStarted.text3: For counselling through email, you will need a private email address.

session.heading: How long is one session?
session.text: At zdravlje.nu we offer 20 minutes and 45 minutes sessions. Sometimes there is no time available for the normal 45 minutes long session, e.g. during working hours, therefore we offer the shorter 20 minutes option.

satisfied.heading: What if I am not happy with my counsellor?
satisfied.text: A good fit between client and counsellor is important, that is why we are happy to change your counsellor without any explicit reason from your side. It is vital that you feel a sense of connection and trust with your counsellor. Please send us an email to info@zdravlje.nu to initiate a change of counsellor.

pay.heading: How do I pay?
pay.text: We have three different options for payment, with credit/debit card, PayPal or invoice. With the credit/debit card and PayPal options you pay online on our website zdravlje.nu. We are using SSL certificate, which creates an encrypted channel between your web browser and our server, making the information you give us private and secure. Credit / debit card numbers are never entering our servers at zdravlje.nu.

payAfter.heading: Can I pay after the session?
payAfter.text: The payment for any session is always payable prior to the appointment. If we do not receive payment before the time of the appointment, with funds cleared into our bank, the appointment will be cancelled or postponed. If your appointment lasts longer than the allotted time, you will be liable for a charge of 2 BAM per minute for the extra time taken.

missSession.heading: What happens if I miss my session?
missSession.text: Should you fail to attend a session, though we will listen sympathetically to any reasons that you may give for not attending, the full cost of the appointment will be chargeable. Any decision to refund any or all of the cost of the session will be at our discretion.

prescriptions.heading: Do you offer prescriptions as part of the counselling?
prescriptions.text: No, a counsellor is not a medicinal doctor and cannot prescribe medicines. Counselling is a form of talking therapy which allows the individual to express their problems, feelings and negative thoughts in a dependable and confidential environment.

troubles.heading: Will I get rid of my troubles?
troubles.text: There is no method or treatment, whether medical or psychological, which provides guaranteed help for all people. This is regardless of whether counselling is online or on-site. Nobody can guarantee you will get 100% free from your problems. However, we can guarantee that we will provide you with the best possible help based on the methods that have been proven to produce the best results for different areas of research.

privacyPolicyView.heading: Politika privatnosti
privacyPolicyView.preamble: Vaša privatnost nam je jako bitna. Osmislili smo našu Politiku privatnosti da bismo Vam mogli prenijeti informacije o tome kako koristiti Zdravlje.nu i o načinu na koji prikupljamo i koristimo Vaš sadržaj i informacije. Podstičemo Vas da pročitate Politiku privatnosti u potpunosti. Zdravlje.nu je podružnica firme Baunad doo Tuzla.

disclosure.heading: Čuvanje podataka
disclosure.text: Sve informacije koje prikupimo putem naše internet stranice i sesija sa klijentima su strogo povjerljive, te neće biti prodavane, iznajmljivane ili na neki drugi način dostupne trećim strankama koje nisu aktivno uključene u pružanje usluga našim klijentima. Mi ćemo uvijek štititi Vaše privatne informacije. Baunad doo Tuzla će otkriti lične informacije samo u slučaju da korisnik pokaže ozbiljnu namjeru da našteti sebi ili drugima, u slučaju da je pod sumnjom za nasilje nad djetetom/djecom, te ukoliko su podaci o osobi zatreženi sudskim nalogom i potrebni u pravnoj procedure koja se vodi protiv osobe. Firma Baunad doo Tuzla nije odgovorna za Vaše otkrivanje informacija o sebi tokom korištenja naših usluga i/ili na javnim forumima, kao ni zbog neopreznosti u zaštiti Vaše šifre prilikom pristupa stranici.

security.heading: Sigurnost podataka
security.text: Naša politika je usmjerena na zaštitu Vaših informacija od neovlaštenog pristupa i zloupotrebe. Zbog toga vodimo računa da zaštitimo te informacije kroz niz tehnološki dostupnih sigurnosnih mjera. Nikada ne pravimo zvučne ili video snimke Vaših online sesija s ciljm zaštite Vaše privatnosti. Uposlenici firme Baunad doo Tuzla su upoznati i imaju iskustva sa pravilnicima i mjerama sigurnosti. U potpunosti shvataju da bilo koji propust u čuvanju Vaših informacija sa njihove strane rezultira jakim disciplinarnim mjerama kao i mogućim završetkom poslovanja unutar Baunad doo Tuzla.

payment.heading: Informacije o plaćanju
payment.text: Broj kreditne kartice i/ili druge finansijske informacije će biti prikupljanje u svrhu procesa plaćanja i naplaćivanja, uključujući ali ne i ograničeno na upotrebu i otkrivanje tih informacija trećim strankama neophodnim za izvršavanje operacija naplaćivanja. Detalji kreditnih i debitnih kartica će biti prenošeni sigurnim stranicama sa provjerenim sistemom sigurne autorizacije i naplate kartica putem interneta (payment gateway systems) koji su digitalno šifrirani, i time pružaju najveći mogući stepen zaštite dostupan putem trenutne tehnologije. Baunad doo Tuzla neće čuvati podatke o Vašim kreditnim i debitnim karticama.

information.heading: Brisanje I uređivanje podataka
information.text: Nikada ne snimamo video sesije sa ciljem zaštite identiteta klijenata. Obrisaćemo sve privatne informacije iz naših sistema ukoliko dobijemo pisani zahtjev od Vas da to učinimo. U tom slučaju sve Vaše private informacije će biti obrisane iz naših sistema bez odgode, osim u slučaju da nam je to zakonom onemogućeno. Molimo Vas da imate na umu da nam je potrebno zadržati neke od informacija zbog održavanja evidencije o poslovanju. Neke od tih rezidualnih informacija će uvijek ostati u našoj evidenciji iako brišemo sve što je moguće izbrisati.

browser.heading: Internet pretraživač I informacije o upotrebi
browser.text: Skupljamo informacije o internet pretraživačima poput: IP adrese, tipa pretraživača, geografske lokacije, vremena provedenog na pojedinim stranicama, informacije o hardveru (u slučaju korištenja mobilnih uređaja prilikom pristupanja stranici) i informacije o operativnom sistemu, u svrhu analiziranja profila korisnika naše stranice i njihovog online ponašanja; posebno izbora sadržaja i usluga. Analiza ovih podataka nam omogućava da bolje razumijemo naše posjetioce kao i da poboljšavamo naš sadržaj i uslugu. Informacije koje imamo o ponašanju korisnika nam pomažu i u pronalaženju tehnoloških problema i rješavanju potencijalnih grešaka u procesu plaćanja i naplaćivanja. Vaše lične informacije i identifikacioni podaci neće biti uparivani sa ovako prikupljenim informacijama i rezultatima anonimnih i spojenih podataka. Nismo vezani Politikom privatnosti ostalih stranica i vanjskih pružatelja usluga koje koristite tokom korištenja naših usluga.

consent.heading: Suglasnost sa ovom politikom privatnosti
consent.text: Korištenjem naših usluga i davanjem Vaših informacija, smatraćemo da ste pročitali, razumjeli i složili se sa našim pravilnikom i načinom rada izloženim u ovoj Politici privatnosti, te da se ona primjenjuje na Vas kao korisnika naših usluga. Time pristajete na prikupljanje, upotrebu i dijeljenje, kao i prenošenje Vaših informacija na način na koji je to opisano ovim pravilnikom. Zadržavamo pravo izmjena, dopuna ili brisanja pojedinih dijelova Politike privatnosti po našem vlastitom nahođenju, u bilo kojem trenutku. Ukoliko se ne slažete sa ovom Politikom privatnosti, Vaš izbor je ne korisiti naše usluge i ne davati nam Vaše informacije. Ukoliko korisitite naše usluge u ime nekog drugog, npr. Vašeg djeteta ili drugog entiteta poput poslodavca, smatraćemo da ste ovlašteni od strane takvog entiteta da to činite, (i) da prihvatate ovu Politiku privatnosti u njihovo ime, (ii) da pristajete na prikupljanje, upotrebu i dijeljenje, kao i prenošenje informacija osoba koje zastupate na način na koji je to opisano ovom Politikom privatnosti.

contact.heading: Kontaktirajte nas
contact.text: Za upite i informacije o pitanjima zaštite privatnosti možete nas kontaktirati na:

privacyPolicyView.updated: Ovaj dokument je zadnji put izmjenjen 11. decembra 2017. od kada stupa na snagu.

checkoutView.heading: Potvrda narudžbe
checkoutView.pleasePay: Molimo uplatite xxx na bankovni računu:
checkoutView.includeIdData: Napišite vaše ime, telefon broj / e-poštu i šifru ispod na uplatnicu:
checkoutView.callbackAffirmation: Mi će mo vas zovnuti da rezerviramo termin za razgovor sa našim psiholozima kada smo primili novac.
checkoutView.invoiceAffirmation: Dobićete fakturu na vašu e-poštu u roku od 24 sata sa detaljima plaćanja.
checkoutView.name: Ime / prezime
checkoutView.invoiceText: Dobićete fakturu sa uputstvima za plaćanje na Vašoj e-pošta (email) adresi.  Kada primimo uplatu na naš bankovni račun, kontaktiraćemo vas kako bismo zakazali termin za vaše psihološko savjetovanje.
